info.title: TeamCloud
info.description: API for working with a TeamCloud instance.

license.name: TeamCloud is licensed under the MIT License

202.description: Started creating the new Project. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

400.description: The projectDefinition specified in the request body did not pass validation.

409.description: A Project already exists with the name specified in the request body.

get.summary: Gets a Project by Name or ID.

404.description: A Project with the specified Name or ID was not found.

202.description: Starts deleting the specified Project. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: A Project with the specified name or ID was not found.

400.description: The ProjectType did not pass validation.

409.description: A ProjectType already exists with the ID provided in the request body.

400.description: The ProjectType did not pass validation.

409.description: A Project Type already exists with the ID provided in the reques body.

get.summary: Gets a Project Type by ID.

404.description: A ProjectType with the projectTypeId provided was not found.
A ProjectType with the projectTypeId provided was not found.

get.summary: Gets all Users for a Project.

400.description: The projectId provided in the path was invalid.

404.description: A Project with the provided projectId was not found, or a User with the provided userId was not found.

202.description: Starts creating the new Project UserProject. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

400.description: The projectId provided in the path was invalid.

404.description: A Project with the provided projectId was not found, or a User with the email address provided in the request body was not found.

409.description: A Project User already exists with the email address provided in the request body.

202.description: Starts updating the Project UserProject. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

400.description: The projectId provided in the path was invalid, or the User provided in the request body did not pass validation.

404.description: A Project with the provided projectId was not found, or a User with the ID provided in the request body was not found.

get.summary: Gets a Project User by ID or email address.

400.description: The projectId provided in the path was invalid.

404.description: A Project with the provided projectId was not found, or a User with the provided identifier was not found.

202.description: Starts deleting the Project UserProject. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

400.description: The projectId provided in the path was invalid.

404.description: A Project with the provided projectId was not found, or a User with the provided identifier was not found.
The TeamCloud instance was not found.

202.description: Starts creating the new Provider. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

400.description: The Provider provided in the request body did not pass validation.

404.description: The TeamCloud instance was not found.

409.description: A Provider already exists with the ID provided in the request body.

202.description: Starts updating the provided Provider. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

400.description: The Provider provided in the request body did not pass validation.

404.description: The TeamCloud instance was not found, or a Provider with the ID provided in the reques body was not found.

200.description: Returns a DataResult with the Provider as the data value.

404.description: The TeamCloud instance was not found, or a Provider with the providerId provided was not found.

202.description: Starts deleting the provided Provider. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: The TeamCloud instance was not found, or a Provider with the provided providerId was not found.

get.summary: Gets the status of a long-running opertation.

202.description: The long-running operation is running. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: The long-running operation with the trackingId provided was not found.

get.summary: Gets the status of a long-running opertation.

202.description: The long-running operation is running. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: The long-running operation with the trackingId provided was not found.
The TeamCloud instance was not found.

202.description: Starts configuring the new TeamCloud instance. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

400.description: The teamCloudConfiguraiton provided in the request body did not pass validation.

409.description: The TeamCloud instance is already configured.

404.description: The TeamCloud instance was not found.

202.description: Starts creating the new TeamCloud UserProject. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

400.description: The User provided in the request body did not pass validation.

404.description: The TeamCloud instance was not found, or a User with the email address provided in the request body was not found.

409.description: A TeamCloud User already exists with the email address provided in the request body.

202.description: Starts updating the TeamCloud UserProject. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

400.description: The User provided in the request body did not pass validation.

404.description: The TeamCloud instance was not found, or a User with the ID provided in the request body was not found.

get.summary: Gets a TeamCloud User by ID or email address.

404.description: The TeamCloud instance was not found, or a User with the provided identifier was not found.

202.description: Starts deleting the TeamCloud User. Returns a StatusResult object that can be used to track progress of the long-running operation.

404.description: The TeamCloud instance was not found, or a User with the identifier provided was not found.
